prompt: A chibi-style character in greyscale construction paper cut-out aesthetic, flat shapes with sharp edges and minimal shading, on transparent background. The face is solid black with no features. The body is in a front-facing centered forward-leaning pose with hands gripping ethereal reins, chibi proportions with large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth. Hair or geometric crystalline appendages incorporating hexagonal fractal, merkaba star, flower of life patterns from sacred geometry symbolism. Outfit is unique: neutral grey and dark grey with high contrast angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns with flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy, elaborate with shifting Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns and merkaba star emblem on chest; texture flat with sharpie-style lines for depth. Include subtle accessory like lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions with celestial spiraling energy emanations. Environmental effect: sacred geometric field creating geometric aura patterns around the character with subtle magical essence emanations like flickering flame wisps and ember particles. Emulate construction paper layering style exactly, but make this visually unique based on Governor ZAMFRES's profile: 'He who appears when praised', Aethyr ZID, Fire element, Tarot The Chariot, Sephirot Yesod, Zodiac Cancer, embodying the essence: 'In ZAMFRES's presence, honest praise takes on life genuine gratitude manifests tangible blessings be...' Resolution 512x512, optimized for layering in Enochian Cyphers game and WebGL rendering with TAP hypertoken metadata embedding.

visual_elements.head_shape: large multi-faceted crystalline head resembling a shifting merkaba structure
visual_elements.body_style: angular geometric body with crystal-like facets, flattened with sharpie-like crease lines
visual_elements.motion_quality: suggesting stillness and motion through sharp, layered cut-outs with drawn depth

outfit.base: angular armor-like robes with flame geometric patterns
outfit.texture: flat with sharpie-style lines for heat and energy
outfit.details: Fire element triangular motifs and ascending patterns

visual_elements.accessory: lunar crescent with silver geometric inscriptions
visual_elements.environment_effect: sacred geometric field with faint aura lines

profile_data.title: 'He who appears when praised'
profile_data.essence: In ZAMFRES's presence, honest praise takes on life genuine gratitude manifests tangible blessings before your eyes.
profile_data.angelic_role: Dominion of Blessings of Praise; guides flameborn hosts.
profile_data.form_description: A dynamic flame-crystalline structure that shifts between human and geometric forms, representing the liminal space between manifestation and pure energy. The form emerges as a chariot-like configuration with flame-edged geometric wings, symbolizing the Governor Angel's role of transformative movement and divine guidance.
profile_data.color_reasoning: Amber represents fire's transformative power and Cancer's nurturing energy, while electric blue signifies the celestial communication of the Enochian system and the dynamic intelligence of Yesod
profile_data.geometry_reasoning: Sacred geometries represent divine intelligence, with hexagonal patterns echoing fire's molecular structure and Merkaba symbolizing interdimensional travel
